amendment.description: An amendment to reduce and then increase funding for the Insular Affairs Assistance to Territories by $13,684,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce and then increase funding for the Insular Affairs Assistance to Territories by $13,684,000.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Plaskett amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A021) offered by Ms. Plaskett.
